evidence.claim: Beyontec utilizes AWS for cloud services and hosting applications.
The company supports X12 EDI transactions, which facilitates healthcare data exchange in compliance with HIPAA.
Beyontec implements HL7 FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare systems.
Microservices architecture is employed by Beyontec for robust integrations between systems.
Beyontec has implemented RESTful APIs for seamless data access and services.

icp.icp_reason: Beyontec supports X12 EDI transactions and utilizes cloud-based APIs.
